executable.title: Decimation
executable.description: Perform a topology-preserving reduction of surface triangles. FastMesh method uses Sven Forstmann's method (https://github.com/sp4cerat/Fast-Quadric-Mesh-Simplification).

double.name: reductionFactor
double.label: Target reduction factor
double.description: Target reduction factor during decimation. Ratio of triangles that are requested to be eliminated. 0.8 means that the mesh size is requested to be reduced by 80%.

string-enumeration.name: method
string-enumeration.label: Method:
string-enumeration.description: Decimation algorithm. Quadric methods provide more even element sizes. FastQuadric allows faster execution at the cost of lowered accuracy. DecimatePro can preserve boundary edges but tend to create more ill-shaped triangles.

boolean.name: boundaryDeletion
boolean.label: DecimatePro Boundary Deletion
boolean.description: Enable deletion of boundary points for DecimatePro method. The flag has no effect if other method is used.

boolean.name: lossless
boolean.description: Lossless remeshing for FastQuadric method. The flag has no effect if other method is used.
boolean.label: FastQuadric Lossless

double.name: aggressiveness
double.label: FastQuadric Aggressiveness
double.description: Balances between accuracy and computation time for FastQuadric method (default = 7.0). The flag has no effect if other method is used.
